extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites    FREN212 and FREN220 and Level 4 and registration in a FREN or FRLG Plan.
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from FREN325; FREN425.

basic.description: A seminar on avant-garde and post-modern works in which students will be asked to examine traditional literary conventions of representation, particularly those established over the course of the 19th century. Class discussion will then shift to avant-garde and post-modern works that question such conventions and also address issues pertaining to the limits of representation. Travaux pratiques include an oral presentation and an in-depth essay. Given jointly with FREN 325/3.0.
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Tendances avant-gardistes et post-modernes au XXè siècle et à l¿ère actuelle
